definitions.definition: A short private road that leads to a house or garage .
A road that enters or circulates through a defined area, such as an institution , compound , land area, etc., for the purpose of private access, maintenance, or security.

main_definition: ( UK , US ) A short private road that leads to a house or garage .
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A road that enters or circulates through a defined area, such as an institution , compound , land area, etc., for the purpose of private access, maintenance, or security.
